Header 1            {#header1}
========

Header 2            {#header2}
--------

### Header 3 ###      {#header3}

Then you can create links to different parts of the same document like this:

[Link back to header 1](#header1),
[Link back to header 2](#header2),
[Link back to header 3](#header3)
